text: Pervomayskaya () is a rural locality (a village) and the administrative center of Pervomaysky Selsoviet, Meleuzovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 764 as of 2010. There are 15 streets. == Geography == It is located 9 km from Meleuz. == References == Category:Rural localities in Meleuzovsky District
title: Pervomayskaya, Republic of Bashkortostan
